page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Nearly all the men in the village have jobs and many of the women too.We asked the children in the school what their parents did for a living.Four people work on{farms}but only three of them work in Chedworth.There are two {manageresses,two secretaries,two {architects and two estate agents _ none of them work here.There are two screen printers who do work in Chedworth.There is one man who works on the aircraft at RAF Kemble ,also a computer expert and a man who repairs British Rail heaters. There are a general builder,an engineer,a pub cleaner,estate worker,two potters,a framer,a welder,a light bulb maker and a shop keeper.In the village there are three authors and five teachers.
By IAN GOODALL and JUSTIN KENIGER
